sentences.en: Debray stepped forward , and cordially pressed the hand of his interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 德布雷走上来热情地和对方握手.

sentences.en: Full Screen Caller will show a big picture and detailed information about your interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 全屏来电显示大图片和详细信息,您的对话者.

sentences.en: Instead, London, Berlin and Paris often seemed to be competing to be Beijing's chosen interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 相反, 伦敦 、 柏林和巴黎似乎常常会争相成为北京方面垂爱的对话者.

sentences.en: Orion had the habit of staring motionlessly at his interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 奥利恩有个一动不动地盯着谈话对象的习惯。

sentences.en: Warren will be the evening's sole interlocutor.
sentences.cn: 沃伦会成为当晚唯一的访谈人。

words.tran_cn: 中间的；对话的；对话体的

trans.tran_en: your interlocutor is the person you are speaking to
